    • multicast

      private void multicast(Serializable m, boolean hasToCrash)
      Multicast a message to every node in the group in random order, it can make the sender crash.
      Parameters:
      m - message to multicast
      hasToCrash - if the current node has to crash

    • forwardPreviousElectionMessage

      private void forwardPreviousElectionMessage(@NotNull @NotNull Utils.Election msg, int idDest)
      Forward the previous election message to the next node. It is used only if the current Node will lose the election.
      Parameters:
      msg - the Election message
      idDest - the destination node ID

    • sendNewElectionMessage

      private void sendNewElectionMessage(@NotNull @NotNull Utils.EpochPair highestData, int idDest)
      Craft a new Election message and send it to the next node.
      Parameters:
      highestData - the highest epoch and iteration registered by the current Node
      idDest - the destination node ID

      public void coordinatorOnVoteResponse(@NotNull @NotNull Utils.VoteResponse msg)
      Register a Node vote. Then, if the quorum is reached or everybody voted, fix the decision and multicast the decision.
      Parameters:
      msg - request to make a vote

      Parameters:
      e - the epoch
      i - the iteration
      Returns:
      true if the quorum is reached, false otherwise
